"Fireworks Celebrating the Nation's Foun:
"The fireworks for National Foundation
Day are the harbingers of great success!
It's enough to make you a bit greedy,
you want to make them even bigger? For
that reason I've come up with this great plan.
The strategy is; Let's set off the fireworks in
space! Pretty neat, huh?! If your mind is
made up, let's carry it out at once!
I want you to gather the necessary
materials at the Cauldron!"

"建国記念日の花火は大盛況の予感だよー！
こうなると欲が出て、もっと大きなことに
挑戦したくならない？
それでわたし、すごい計画を立てたんだー。
なんと宇宙で花火を上げちゃおう！
って作戦なんだー！　ね、すごいでしょ？！
思い立ったら即行動！　必要な素材を
火山洞窟で集めて来てほしいなぁ！"
